cast.overview: Marina's life is thrown into turmoil following the death of her partner. Mourning the loss of the man she loved, she finds herself under intense scrutiny from those with no regard for her privacy.
cast.title: A Fantastic Woman

details.biography: Loreto Leonvendagar was born in 1979 in Santiago, Chile. She is an actress and performing artist. She has carried out in theater, contemporary dance and cinema. Between 2008-2010, she studied a MA in International Performance Research (University of Amsterdam and Warwick). As a film actress she has worked, among others, with Constanza Fernández (No me pidas que no lo lamente, El padeciente) Sebastián Lelio (Carga Vital, 12 minutos), Matías Bize (Sábado), and Paula Leonvendagar (Metamorfosis , Iguales).
details.name: Loreto Leonvendagar
